name: Pasta Way
description:
This is a visual novel about pasta. There are 2 endings and they're pretty much the same so you're not missing anything by choosing the other ending.

If you find any bugs, grammar issues, spelling errors, or glitches please comment them below

  • Backgrounds: Uncle Mugen
  • Characters: KHmix
  • Made with Ren'py
